chunks.text: Under the MTA, Free Miner Certificate holders can automatically register claims... without prior consultation with First Nations.
Starting March 26, 2025, the Province will consult First Nations before registering new claims... to understand potential impacts.
Monthly, consultation packages are sent to First Nations, who have 30 days... to raise concerns related to culture, environment.

task2_government_pdfs_canada.title: Updated Guidelines for Federal Officials to Fulfill the Duty to Consult

chunks.text: The duty to consult stems from the Honour of the Crown... triggered by contemplated Crown conduct that may adversely impact Aboriginal rights.
Consultation should be integrated into environmental assessment... for major resource projects including mineral mining and energy generation.
If impacts are identified, implement measures to avoid or minimize effects... such as modifying project designs for hydro infrastructure.
